title: Join a Zoom meeting on Android

steps.text: Open the Zoom app. If you don't have it, download it from the Play Store first.
steps.tts: Open the Zoom app. If you don't have it, download it from the Play Store first.

steps.text: Tap "Join a Meeting" on the main screen.
steps.tts: Tap Join a Meeting on the main screen.

steps.text: Enter the meeting ID that was shared with you. It's usually a 9- or 10-digit number.
steps.tts: Enter the meeting ID that was shared with you. It's usually a nine or ten digit number.

steps.text: Tap "Join." You may be asked to type your name â€” enter it and tap OK.
steps.tts: Tap Join. You may be asked to type your name. Enter it and tap OK.

steps.text: If asked for a passcode, enter the one from your invite and tap OK. You're in!
steps.tts: If asked for a passcode, enter the one from your invite and tap OK. You're in!
